title: What to Watch: Seven Shows, Movies and Stories to Stream
sub_head: Apple TV+’s ‘Invasion’ was inspired by ‘The War of the Worlds’; ‘Queens’ on Hulu resurrects the ’90s, and Ron and Clint Howard reflect on family and Hollywood
body: In “Queens,” Eve and Brandy look back at the ’90s; in “The Boys,” Ron and Clint Howard return to “Happy Days”; and in “Invasion,” Simon Kinberg (sort of) returns to “The War of the Worlds.” Here’s where to stream it all:
